name: libraryconsumption
description: A test repository to learn how to create a small library and how to consume it

scripts.ui:init:start:dev: yarn ctrllib:build && yarn themelib:build && yarn workspace ui5-library-consumption start
scripts.ui:init:start:build: yarn ctrllib:build && yarn themelib:build && yarn workspace ui5-library-consumption build && yarn start:build
